name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flippy: Smartly Revisit Your Saved Content!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smartly revisit your saved content — blogs, articles, bookmarks and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking to catch up on daily blog posts? Or perhaps you want to start your day with an inspiring piece from your favorite saved websites, videos, or articles? Maybe you’d like a structured tour through the content you’ve earmarked to read later. Flippy is the extension designed to help you smartly revisit everything you’ve saved.

Key Features:

Surprise Discovery Every Tab: Each new tab reveals a random piece of your saved content—be it a website, blog, or video—turning every tab into a delightful surprise. Effortlessly uncover hidden gems you’ve forgotten about.

Interactive Tour Mode: Dive deeper into your saved items with our “Tour” feature. Simply select a folder or category, and click a button to view each piece in sequence. It’s like having a remote control for your content, letting you scroll through until you find something you’re excited to explore.

Elevate your browsing experience by turning your saved content into a treasure trove of discoveries. Whether you crave spontaneous surprises or a methodical approach, Flippy transforms your saved resources into a more dynamic and engaging exploration!
